trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet,gallery
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet,gallery

trans-unit.source: psgallery_faqs
trans-unit.target: psgallery_faqs

trans-unit.source: Frequently Asked Questions
trans-unit.target: 常见问题

trans-unit.source: What is a PowerShell module?
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 模块是什么？

trans-unit.source: A PowerShell module is a reusable package containing some PowerShell functionality.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 模块是包含某些 PowerShell 功能的可重复使用程序包。

trans-unit.source: Everything in PowerShell (functions, variables, DSC resources, etc.) can be packaged in modules.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 中的所有内容（函数、变量、DSC 资源等）都可打包在模块中。

trans-unit.source: Typically, modules are folders containing specific types of files stored on a specific path.
trans-unit.target: 通常，模块是包含特定路径上存储的特定类型文件的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: There are a few different types of PowerShell modules out there.
trans-unit.target: 共有几种不同的 PowerShell 模块类型。

trans-unit.source: What is a PowerShell script?
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 脚本是什么？

trans-unit.source: A PowerShell script is a series of commands that are stored in a .ps1 file to enable reuse and sharing.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 脚本是存储在.ps1 文件中的一系列命令，用于启用重用和共享。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell workflows are also PowerShell scripts, which outline a set of tasks and provide sequencing for those tasks.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 工作流也是 PowerShell 脚本，可概述任务组和提供这些任务的序列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please visit [Getting Started with PowerShell Workflow](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj134242.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请访问 [Getting Started with PowerShell Workflow](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj134242.aspx)（PowerShell 工作流入门）。

trans-unit.source: How are PowerShell Scripts different from PowerShell Modules?
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 脚本 与 PowerShell 模块有何不同？

trans-unit.source: Modules are generally better for sharing, but we are enabling script sharing to make it easier for you to contribute workflows and scripts to the community.
trans-unit.target: 通常模块更适合共享，但我们正启用脚本共享使向社区贡献工作流和脚本变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the following blogs:
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅以下博客：

trans-unit.source: Don't Write Scripts, Write PowerShell Modules
trans-unit.target: 不编写脚本，编写 PowerShell 模块

trans-unit.source: Understanding PowerShell Modules
trans-unit.target: 了解 PowerShell 模块

trans-unit.source: How can I publish to the PowerShell Gallery?
trans-unit.target: 如何发布到 PowerShell 库？

trans-unit.source: You must register an account in the PowerShell Gallery before you can publish items to the Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 必须在 PowerShell 库中注册帐户后才可将项发布到库中。

trans-unit.source: This is because publishing items requires a NuGetApiKey, which is provided upon registration.
trans-unit.target: 原因是发布项需要注册时提供的 NuGetApiKey。

trans-unit.source: To register, use your personal, work, or school account to sign in to the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 若要注册，请使用个人、工作或学校帐户登录到 PowerShell 库。

trans-unit.source: A one-time registration process is required when you sign in for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 第一次登录时需要一次性注册过程。

trans-unit.source: Afterwards, your NuGetApiKey is available on your profile page.
trans-unit.target: 此后，个人资料页上会提供 NuGetApiKey。

trans-unit.source: Once you have registered in the Gallery, use the [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) or [Publish-Script](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlets to publish your item to the Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 在库中注册后，使用 [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) 或 [Publish-Script](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet 将项发布到库中。

trans-unit.source: For more details on how to run these cmdlets, visit the Publish tab, or read the [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) and [Publish-Script](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何运行这些 cmdlet 的详细信息，请访问“发布”选项卡，或阅读 [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) 和 [Publish-Script](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) 文档。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to register or sign in to the Gallery to install or save items.
trans-unit.target: 安装或保存项无需注册或登录到库。

trans-unit.source: I received "Failed to process request.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将项发布到 PowerShell 库时，出现“无法处理请求。

trans-unit.source: 'The specified API key is invalid or does not have permission to access the specified package.'.
trans-unit.target: ‘指定的 API 密钥无效或无权限访问指定的包。’。

trans-unit.source: The remote server returned an error: (403) Forbidden."
trans-unit.target: 远程服务器返回错误：(403) 已禁止。”

trans-unit.source: error when I tried to publish an item to the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 错误。

trans-unit.source: What does that mean?
trans-unit.target: 这是什么意思？

trans-unit.source: This error can occur for the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 出现该错误的原因可能如下：

trans-unit.source: The specified API key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 API 密钥无效。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have specified the valid API key from your account.
trans-unit.target: 请确保帐户中指定了有效的 API 密钥。

trans-unit.source: To get your API key, view your profile page.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取 API 密钥，请查看个人资料页。

trans-unit.source: The specified item name is not owned by you.
trans-unit.target: 指定的项名称不属于你。

trans-unit.source: If you have confirmed that your API key is correct, then there may already exist an item with the same name as the one you are trying to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果已确认 API 密钥无误，则可能是因为已存在一个具有与你尝试使用的名称相同的项。

trans-unit.source: The item may have been unlisted by the owner, in which case it will not appear in any search results.
trans-unit.target: 该项可能未被其所有者列出，这种情况下，该项不会出现在任何搜索结果中。

trans-unit.source: To determine if an item with the same name already exists, open a browser and navigate to the item's details page: `https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/<itemName>`.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定具有相同名称的项是否已经存在，请打开浏览器并导航至该项的详细信息页：`https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/<itemName>`。

trans-unit.source: For example, navigating directly to `https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/pester` will take you to the Pester module's details page, whether it is unlisted or not.
trans-unit.target: 例如，直接导航至 `https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/pester` 将进入 Pester 模块的详细信息页上，无论其列出与否。

trans-unit.source: If an item with a conflicting name already exists and is unlisted, you can:
trans-unit.target: 如果具有冲突名称的项已经存在且未被列出，可：

trans-unit.source: Select another name for your item.
trans-unit.target: 选择其他项名称。

trans-unit.source: Contact the owners of the existing item.
trans-unit.target: 联系现有项的所有者。

trans-unit.source: Why can't I sign in with my personal account, but I could sign in yesterday?
trans-unit.target: 为什么昨天可使用个人帐户登录而现在却无法登陆？

trans-unit.source: Please be aware that your gallery account does not accommodate changes to your primary email alias.
trans-unit.target: 请注意库帐户不会适应主电子邮件别名的更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Email Aliases](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/outlook/add-alias-account).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Microsoft 电子邮件别名](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/outlook/add-alias-account)。

trans-unit.source: Why don't I see all the gallery items when I select all the Category checkboxes on the Items tab?
trans-unit.target: 为什么选中“项”选项卡上所有“类别”复选框时没有显示所有库项？

trans-unit.source: By selecting a Category checkbox, you are stating "I would like to see all items in this category."
trans-unit.target: 选中“类别”复选框表示“查看此类别中所有的项”。

trans-unit.source: Only the items in the selected categories will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 仅会显示所选类别中的项。

trans-unit.source: So similarly, by selecting all the Category checkboxes, you are stating "I would like to see all items in any category."
trans-unit.target: 同样，选中所有的“类别”复选框表示“查看所有类别中的所有项”。

trans-unit.source: But some items in the gallery do not belong to any of the categories listed, so they will not appear in the results.
trans-unit.target: 但库中的一些项不属于任何列出的类别，因而不会显示在结果中。

trans-unit.source: To see all items in the gallery, uncheck all the Categories, or select the Items tab again.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看库中的所有项，请取消选中所有类别，或再次选择“项”选项卡。

trans-unit.source: What are the requirements to publish a module to the PowerShell Gallery?
trans-unit.target: 将模块发布到 PowerShell 库中有什么要求？

trans-unit.source: Any kind of PowerShell module (script modules, binary modules, or manifest modules) can be published to the gallery.
trans-unit.target: 任何种类的 PowerShell 模块（脚本模块、二进制模块或清单模块）都可发布到库中。

trans-unit.source: To publish a module, PowerShellGet needs to know a few things about it - the version, description, author, and how it is licensed.
trans-unit.target: 若要发布模块，PowerShellGet 需要了解该模块的版本、说明、作者和许可方式等信息。

trans-unit.source: This information is read as part of the publishing process from the *module manifest* (.psd1) file, or from the value of the [**Publish-Module**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet's **LicenseUri** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从模块清单 (.psd1) 文件或 [**Publish-Module**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet 的 **LicenseUri** 参数的值的部分发布过程中读取此信息。

trans-unit.source: All modules published to the Gallery must have module manifests.
trans-unit.target: 所有发布到库中的模块必须具有模块清单。

trans-unit.source: Any module that includes the following information in its manifest can be published to the Gallery:
trans-unit.target: 清单中包含以下信息的任何模块都可发布到库中：

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.target: 版本

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Author
trans-unit.target: 作者

trans-unit.source: A URI to the license terms of the module, either as part of the **PrivateData** section of the manifest, or in the **LicenseUri** parameter of the [**Publish-Module**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 一个该模块许可条款的 URI，或作为该清单的 **PrivateData** 的一部分，或在 [**Publish-Module**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet 的 **LicenseUri** 参数中。

trans-unit.source: How do I create a correctly-formatted module manifest?
trans-unit.target: 如何创建格式正确的模块清单？

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to create a module manifest is to run the [**New-ModuleManifest**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 创建模块清单最简单的方法是运行 [**New-ModuleManifest**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: In PowerShell 5.0 or newer, New-ModuleManifest generates a correctly-formatted module manifest with blank fields for useful metadata like **ProjectUri**, **LicenseUri**, and **Tags**.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 5.0 或更高版本中，New-ModuleManifest 会生成格式正确的模块清单，其中包含 **ProjectUri**、**LicenseUri**、**Tags** 等有用元数据的空白字段。

trans-unit.source: Simply fill in the blanks, or use the generated manifest as an example of correct formatting.
trans-unit.target: 只需填写空值，或使用生成的清单作为正确格式的示例。

trans-unit.source: To verify that all required metadata fields have been properly filled, use the [**Test-ModuleManifest**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证是否已正确填写所有必需的元数据字段，请使用 [**Test-ModuleManifest**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To update the module manifest file fields, use the [**Update-ModuleManifest**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新模块清单文件字段，请使用 [**Update-ModuleManifest**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: What are the requirements to publish a script to the Gallery?
trans-unit.target: 将脚本发布到库中有什么要求？

trans-unit.source: Any kind of PowerShell script (scripts or workflows) can be published to the gallery.
trans-unit.target: 任何种类的 PowerShell 脚本（脚本或工作流）都可发布到库中。

trans-unit.source: To publish a script, PowerShellGet needs to know a few things about it - the version, description, author, and how it is licensed.
trans-unit.target: 若要发布脚本，PowerShellGet 需要了解该脚本的版本、说明、作者和许可方式等信息。

trans-unit.source: This information is read as part of the publishing process from the script file's *PSScriptInfo* section, or from the value of the [**Publish-Script**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet's **LicenseUri** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从脚本文件的 PSScriptInfo 部分或 [**Publish-Script**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet 的 **LicenseUri** 参数的值的部分发布过程中读取此信息。

trans-unit.source: All scripts published to the Gallery must have metadata information.
trans-unit.target: 所有发布到库中的脚本必须具有元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: Any script that includes the following information in its PSScriptInfo section can be published to the Gallery:
trans-unit.target: PSScriptInfo 部分中包括以下信息的任何脚本都可发布到库中：

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.target: 版本

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Author
trans-unit.target: 作者

trans-unit.source: A URI to the license terms of the script, either as part of the **PSScriptInfo** section of the script, or in the **LicenseUri** parameter of the [**Publish-Script**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 一个该脚本许可条款的 URI，或作为此脚本的 **PSScriptInfo** 的一部分，或在 [**Publish-Script**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet 的 **LicenseUri** 参数中。

trans-unit.source: How do I search?
trans-unit.target: 如何搜索？

trans-unit.source: Type what you are looking for in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 在文本框中键入要查找的内容。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to find modules that are related to Azure SQL, just type "azure sql".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如要查找与 Azure SQL 相关的模块，只需键入“azure sql”。

trans-unit.source: Our search engine will look for those keywords in all published items, including titles, descriptions and across metadata.
trans-unit.target: 搜索引擎会在所有已发布的项（包括标题、说明和元数据）中查找这些关键字。

trans-unit.source: Then, based on a weighted quality score, it will display the closest matches.
trans-unit.target: 然后，根据加权质量分，搜索引擎将显示最接近的匹配。

trans-unit.source: You can also search by specific field using field:"value" syntax in the search query for the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以在以下字段的搜索查询中使用 field:"value" 语法按指定字段进行搜索：

trans-unit.source: Tags
trans-unit.target: 标记

trans-unit.source: Functions
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet

trans-unit.source: DscResources
trans-unit.target: DscResources

trans-unit.source: PowerShellVersion
trans-unit.target: PowerShellVersion

trans-unit.source: So, for example, when you search for PowerShellVersion:"2.0" only results that are compatible with PowerShellVersion 2.0 (based on their module/script manifest) will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，搜索 PowerShellVersion:"2.0" 时，仅会显示与 PowerShellVersion 2.0 相容（基于其模块/脚本清单）的结果。

trans-unit.source: How do I create a correctly-formatted script file?
trans-unit.target: 如何创建格式正确的脚本文件？

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to create a properly-formatted script file is to run the [**New-ScriptFileInfo**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 创建格式正确的脚本文件最简单的方法是运行 [**New-ScriptFileInfo**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: In PowerShell 5.0, New-ScriptFileInfo generates a correctly-formatted script file with blank fields for useful metadata like **ProjectUri**, **LicenseUri**, and **Tags**.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 5.0 中，New-ScriptFileInfo 会生成格式正确的脚本文件，其中包含 **ProjectUri**、**LicenseUri**、**Tags** 等有用元数据的空白字段。

trans-unit.source: Simply fill in the blanks, or use the generated script file as an example of correct formatting.
trans-unit.target: 只需填写空值，或使用生成的脚本文件作为正确格式的示例。

trans-unit.source: To verify that all required metadata fields have been properly filled, use the [**Test-ScriptFileInfo**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证是否已正确填写所有必需的元数据字段，请使用 [**Test-ScriptFileInfo**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To update the script metadata fields, use the [**Update-ScriptFileInfo**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新脚本元数据字段，请使用 [**Update-ScriptFileInfo**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: What other types of PowerShell Modules exist?
trans-unit.target: 还有哪些其他类型的 PowerShell 模块？

trans-unit.source: The term PowerShell module also refers to the files that implement actual functionality.
trans-unit.target: 术语 PowerShell 模块也指执行实际功能的文件。

trans-unit.source: Script module files (.psm1) contain PowerShell code.
trans-unit.target: 脚本模块文件 (.psm1) 包含 PowerShell 代码。

trans-unit.source: Binary module files (.dll) contain compiled code.
trans-unit.target: 二进制模块文件 (.dll) 包含已编译的代码。

trans-unit.source: Here is one way to think about it: the folder that encapsulates the module is the module folder.
trans-unit.target: 可这样理解：封装模块的文件夹即是模块文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The module folder can contain a module manifest (.psd1) that describes the contents of the folder.
trans-unit.target: 模块文件夹包含描述该文件夹内容的模块清单 (.psd1)。

trans-unit.source: The files that actually do the work are the script module files (.psm1) and the binary module files (.dll).
trans-unit.target: 实际完成工作的文件是脚本模块文件 (.psm1) 和二进制模块文件 (.dll)。

trans-unit.source: DSC resources are located in a specific sub-folder, and are implemented as script module files or binary module files.
trans-unit.target: DSC 资源位于特定的子文件夹中，并作为脚本模块文件或二进制文件执行。

trans-unit.source: All of the modules in the Gallery contain module manifests, and most of these modules contain script module files or binary module files.
trans-unit.target: 库中所有模块包含模块清单，且其中大多数模块包含脚本模块文件或二进制模块文件。

trans-unit.source: The term module can be confusing because of these different meanings.
trans-unit.target: 由于这些不同的含义，术语模块可能会造成混淆。

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly stated otherwise, all uses of the word module on this page refer to the module folder containing these files.
trans-unit.target: 除非明确说明，否则此页上所有使用的“模块”一词都指包含这些文件的模块文件夹。

trans-unit.source: How does PackageManagement relate to PowerShellGet?
trans-unit.target: PackageManagement 与 PowerShellGet 有何关联？

trans-unit.source: (High Level Answer)
trans-unit.target: （高级回答）

trans-unit.source: PackageManagement is a common interface for working with any package manager.
trans-unit.target: PackageManagement 是使用任何程序包管理器的一个公共接口。

trans-unit.source: Eventually, whether you're dealing with PowerShell modules, MSIs, Ruby gems, NuGet packages, or Perl modules, you should be able to use PackageManagement's commands (Find-Package and Install-Package) to find and install them.
trans-unit.target: 最后，无论是处理 PowerShell 模块、MSI、Ruby gem、NuGet 包还是 Perl 模块，都可使用 PackageManagement 命令（Find-Package 和 Install-Package）进行查找和安装。

trans-unit.source: PackageManagement does this by having a package provider for each package manager that plugs into PackageManagement.
trans-unit.target: 每个插入 PackageManagement 的程序包管理器都具有一个程序包提供程序，因而 PackageManagement 可实现该操作。

trans-unit.source: Providers do all of the actual work; they fetch content from repositories, and install the content locally.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序完成所有的实际工作；它们从存储库中提取内容，并本地安装内容。

trans-unit.source: Often, package providers simply wrap around the existing package manager tools for a given package type.
trans-unit.target: 通常，程序包提供程序环绕处理给定程序包类型的现有程序包管理器工具。

trans-unit.source: PowerShellGet is the package manager for PowerShell items.
trans-unit.target: PowerShellGet 是 PowerShell 项的程序包管理器。

trans-unit.source: There is a PSModule package provider that exposes PowerShellGet functionality through PackageManagement.
trans-unit.target: 存在一个通过 PackageManagement 揭示 PowerShellGet 功能的 PSModule 程序包提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you can either run [Install-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) or Install-Package -Provider PSModule to install a module from the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可运行 [Install-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) 或 Install-Package -Provider PSModule 来从 PowerShell 库安装模块。

trans-unit.source: Certain PowerShellGet functionality, including [Update-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) and [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409), cannot be accessed through PackageManagement commands.
trans-unit.target: 特定 PowerShellGet 功能（包括 [Update-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) 和 [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409)）无法通过 PackageManagement 命令访问。

trans-unit.source: In summary, PowerShellGet is solely focused on having a premium package management experience for PowerShell content.
trans-unit.target: 总之，PowerShellGet 仅侧重于提供优质 PowerShell 内容的程序包管理体验。

trans-unit.source: PackageManagement is focused on exposing all package management experiences through one general set of tools.
trans-unit.target: PackageManagement 侧重于通过一组工具公开所有的包管理体验。

trans-unit.source: If you find this answer unsatisfying, there is a long answer at the bottom of this document, in the **How does PackageManagement actually relate to PowerShellGet?** section.
trans-unit.target: 如对此回答不满意，可在本文档底部的 **PackageManagement 与 PowerShellGet 有何关联？** 部分中查看更详尽的回答。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please visit the [PackageManagement project page](http://oneget.org/).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请访问 [PackageManagement 项目页](http://oneget.org/)。

trans-unit.source: How does NuGet relate to PowerShellGet?
trans-unit.target: NuGet 与 PowerShellGet 有何关联？

trans-unit.source: The PowerShell Gallery is a modified version of the [NuGet Gallery](http://www.nuget.org/).
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 库是 [NuGet Gallery](http://www.nuget.org/)（NuGet 库）的修改版本。

trans-unit.source: PowerShellGet uses NuGet provider to work with NuGet based repositories like the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: PowerShellGet 使用 NuGet 提供程序支持基于 NuGet 的存储库，例如 PowerShell 库。

trans-unit.source: You can use PowerShellGet against any valid NuGet repository or file share.
trans-unit.target: 可对任何有效的 NuGet 存储库或文件共享使用 PowerShellGet。

trans-unit.source: You simply need to add the repository by running the [**Register-PSRepository**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 只需通过运行 [**Register-PSRepository**](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) cmdlet 添加此存储库。

trans-unit.source: Does that mean I can use NuGet.exe to work with the Gallery?
trans-unit.target: 这是否意味着可以使用 NuGet.exe 来处理库？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 是的。

trans-unit.source: How does PackageManagement actually relate to PowerShellGet?
trans-unit.target: PackageManagement 与 PowerShellGet 有何关联？

trans-unit.source: (Technical Details)
trans-unit.target: （技术细节）

trans-unit.source: Under the hood, PowerShellGet heavily leverages PackageManagement infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，PowerShellGet 很大程度上利用了 PackageManagement 基础结构。

trans-unit.source: At the PowerShell cmdlet layer, [Install-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) is actually a thin wrapper around Install-Package -Provider PSModule.
trans-unit.target: 在 PowerShell cmdlet 层，[Install-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=760387&clcid=0x409) 实际上是 Install-Package -Provider PSModule 的薄包装器。

trans-unit.source: At the PackageManagement package provider layer, the PSModule package provider actually calls into other PackageManagement package providers.
trans-unit.target: 在 PackageManagement 程序包提供程序层，PSModule 程序包提供程序实际调用到其他 PackageManagement 程序包提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you are working with NuGet-based galleries (such as the PowerShell Gallery), the PSModule package provider uses the NuGet Package Provider to work with the repository.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用基于 NuGet 的库（例如 PowerShell 库）时，PSModule 程序包提供程序会使用 NuGet 程序包提供程序作用于该存储库。

trans-unit.source: PowerShellGet Architecture
trans-unit.target: PowerShellGet 体系结构

trans-unit.source: Figure 1: PowerShellGet Architecture
trans-unit.target: 图 1：PowerShellGet 体系结构

trans-unit.source: What is required to run PowerShellGet?
trans-unit.target: 运行 PowerShellGet 有什么要求？

trans-unit.source: In general we recommend picking the latest version of PowerShellGet module (note that it requires .NET 4.5).
trans-unit.target: 通常，建议选取最新版本的 PowerShellGet 模块（请注意其需要.NET 4.5）。

trans-unit.source: The **PowerShellGet** module requires **PowerShell 3.0 or newer**.
trans-unit.target: **PowerShellGet** 模块需要 **PowerShell 3.0 或更高版本**。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, **PowerShellGet** requires one of the following operating systems:
trans-unit.target: 因此，**PowerShellGet** 需要以下操作系统之一：

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 Pro
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1 专业版

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 Enterprise
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1 企业版

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 SP1
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2016
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2016

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1

trans-unit.source: **PowerShellGet** also requires .NET Framework 4.5 or above.
trans-unit.target: **PowerShellGet** 也需要 .NET Framework 4.5 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: You can install .NET Framework 4.5 or above from [here](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 你可从[此处](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx)安装 .NET Framework 4.5 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to reserve names for items that will be published in future?
trans-unit.target: 是否可保留将来要发布的项的名称？

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to squat item names.
trans-unit.target: 不能抢占项名称。

trans-unit.source: If you feel that an existing item has taken the name which suits your item more, try [contacting the owner of the item](psgallery_contacting_item_owners.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果认为现有项占用的名称更适合你的项，可尝试[联系项的所有者](psgallery_contacting_item_owners.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you didnt get response within a couple of weeks, you can contact support and the PowerShell Gallery team will look in to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果数周内未获得回复，可联系支持人员，PowerShell 库团队将进行查看。

trans-unit.source: How do I claim ownership for items ?
trans-unit.target: 如何索取项的所有权？

trans-unit.source: Check out [Managing Item Owners on PowerShellGallery.com](Managing-Item-Owners.md) for details.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请查看 PowerShellGallery.com 上的[管理项所有者](Managing-Item-Owners.md)。

trans-unit.source: How do I deal with an item owner who is violating my item license?
trans-unit.target: 如何处理违反项许可证的项所有者？

trans-unit.source: We encourage the PowerShell community to work together to resolve any disputes that may arise between item owners and the owners of other items.
trans-unit.target: 我们鼓励 PowerShell 社区解决项所有者之间可能出现的任何争议。

trans-unit.source: We have crafted a [dispute resolution process](psgallery_dispute_resolution.md) that we ask you to follow before PowerShellGallery.com administrators intercede.
trans-unit.target: PowerShellGallery.com 管理员进行调解之前，我们希望你遵循我们精心指定的[争议解决过程](psgallery_dispute_resolution.md)。
